name: Verband der österreichischen Arzneimittel-Vollgroßhändler
goal: PHAGO is the voluntary-membership special interest group of the Austrian full-line pharmaceutical wholesale trade, looking after the political und commercial interests of its member companies within the applicable statutes and regulations.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Food Safety, Public Health, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
European Commissions communication regarding Falsified Medicines Directive
Medical Devices Regulation
